name: Ancient Crab
flavor_text: The banks of the Luxa River attract all manner of predator but only the most resilient of prey.

Whenever a creature token enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

name: Aven Initiate
oracle_text:
Flying
Embalm {6}{U} ({6}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a white Zombie Bird Warrior with no mana cost. Embalm only as a sorcery.)

name: Benefaction of Rhonas
oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or an enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: It falls to the gods to help all become worthy of the afterlife.

name: Binding Mummy
oracle_text: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, you may tap target artifact or creature.
flavor_text: What the gods decree, the mummies enforce.

name: Bitterblade Warrior
oracle_text: You may exert Bitterblade Warrior as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor_text: "The vizier of poisons teaches an unconventional kind of strength."

name: Blazing Volley
oracle_text: Blazing Volley deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
flavor_text: The arrows fell like fiery rain, and for a moment, the sky itself seemed to burn.

name: Blighted Bat
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}: Blighted Bat gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Amonkhet's dual suns don't allow for the darkness of night, so bats are most active under the gloom of the frequent sandstorms.

name: Bloodlust Inciter
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "To victory! To glory! To eternity!"

name: Brute Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Oketra had our crop build an obelisk to prove the power of working together. But I am stronger without the weak."

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: "Let me try one of Kefnet's puzzles. This one was too easy."

name: Cartouche of Ambition
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control

Enchant creature you control

oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Solidarity enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.

Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Strength enters the battlefield, you may have enchanted creature fight target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.

name: Cartouche of Zeal

Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Zeal enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

flavor_text: The fifth cartouche is the final affirmation of glory, granted only to the worthy dead.

name: Cinder Barrens
oracle_text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavor_text: A mudflow swallowed the lowlands years ago. All that remains are a bottomless mire and an endless rain of ash.

name: Colossapede
flavor_text:
"If it is bigger, you must be faster. If it is stronger, you must be sharper. Anything less, and you will never seize a place in our God-Pharaoh's perfect afterlife."
—Rhonas, god of strength

name: Compelling Argument
oracle_text:
Target player mills five cards.

flavor_text:
"How can there be doubt in the presence of such blessings?"

oracle_text:
Enchant creature

{T}: Add {C}.

name: Cursed Minotaur
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Decision Paralysis
oracle_text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

name: Desert Cerodon

Destroy target artifact.

name: Essence Scatter

name: Evolving Wilds

name: Fling
